Name: Racer 8
About the game: Racer 8 is the ultimate Rally inspired puzzle game that will have players revving their engines or leave them running on fumes! A mixture of asset management, time trial and puzzle game, Racer 8 plays on several different mechanics to keep playersâ€™ heads constantly spinning. Navigate your car, which is constantly in motion while rotate the square tiles on the map grid in order to form a track for your car to follow, through a series of checkpoints and ultimately across the finish line.
